snippet: A British man who spent nearly two decades hiding in the United States after driving off with an armored van with $1.5 million in England was sentenced Tuesday in London to five years in jail.
abstract: Edward J Maher, British man who hid in the United States for nearly two decades after stealing $1.5 million in England, is sentenced to five years in English jail.
lead_paragraph: A British man who spent nearly two decades hiding in the United States after driving off with an armored van with $1.5 million in England was sentenced Tuesday in London to five years in jail.

headline.main: Missouri: Jail After Years of Hiding
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Prison After Years of Hiding
